___name.gltf_detailedDescription: The user-defined name of this object.  This is not necessarily unique, e.g., an accessor and a buffer could have the same name, or two accessors could even have the same name.
___name.description: The user-defined name of this object.

description: Texture sampler properties for filtering and wrapping modes.
title: Sampler

___wrapS.gltf_detailedDescription: S (U) wrapping mode.  All valid values correspond to WebGL enums.

___wrapT.gltf_detailedDescription: T (V) wrapping mode.  All valid values correspond to WebGL enums.

___magFilter.gltf_detailedDescription: Magnification filter.  Valid values correspond to WebGL enums: `9728` (NEAREST) and `9729` (LINEAR).

___minFilter.gltf_detailedDescription: Minification filter.  All valid values correspond to WebGL enums.
